author: mduerig
msg: JCR-2500: spi2davex NodeInfoImpl should use HashSet instead of ArrayList for childInfos
using LinkedHashSet to guarantee order of children

author: rjung
msg: - optionally shuts down the connection if valid
Using it with shutdown=JK_FALSE is meant for the case
when a previous socket operation already implicitely
shut down the connection due to an error
Note that this adds two more connection counter decrements

author: zshao
msg: HIVE-1185. Fix RCFile resource leak when opening a non-RCFile. (He Yongqiang via zshao)
